name: TVMediaItem
desc: A single audio or video item associated with the Apple TV JavaScript player.

items.name: var containsExplicitContent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the item contains adult-oriented content.

items.name: var contentRatingDomain: TVMediaItem.ContentRatingDomain?
items.desc: The media domain that the rating applies to.

items.name: struct TVMediaItem.ContentRatingDomain
items.desc: A value identifying the media's content rating domain.

items.name: var contentRatingRanking: NSNumber?
items.desc: The rating for a video item.

items.name: var artworkImageURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL path to the artwork that accompanies the media item.

items.name: var itemDescription: String?
items.desc: The description for a media item.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: The subtitle for a media item.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title for a media item.

items.name: struct TVMediaItem.MediaType
items.desc: A value indicating whether the media is audio or video.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL path to the media item.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: User-defined metadata, like a developer-specific identifier, for a media item.

items.name: var highlightGroups: [TVMediaItem.HighlightGroup]
items.desc: An array containing groups of individual highlights in a media item.

items.name: class TVMediaItem.HighlightGroup
items.desc: A container for groups of highlights for a media item.

items.name: var interstitials: [TVMediaItem.TimeRange]
items.desc: An array of time intervals that indicate where to insert media items into another, single media item.

items.name: class TVMediaItem.TimeRange
items.desc: An object that defines a time range in a media item.

items.name: var resumeTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The number of seconds from the beginning of a media item to the point where that media item begins playing.
